sentences.sContent: He was Robert E. Lee. Lee was a Virginian and had served in the United States army for more than thirty years.
sentences.sContent_eng: He was Robert E. Lee. Lee was a Virginian and had served in the United States army for more than thirty years.
sentences.sCn: 李是维吉尼亚人，他在美国军队中服役已有三十多年时间。

sentences.sContent: "When you call me that, smile," the hero said to the bad man in that first of thousands of cowboy novels, Owen Wister's "The Virginian.
sentences.sContent_eng: "When you call me that, smile," the hero said to the bad man in that first of thousands of cowboy novels, Owen Wister's "The Virginian.
sentences.sCn: “当你称呼我为牛仔，请微笑，”在欧文·威斯特的小说《弗吉尼亚州的人》中的英雄对坏蛋说到，这本小说是数以千计的有关牛仔小说中最早的一本。
